attributes.action: carry through the Government's proposed rise in fuel duty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent rises in crude oil costs allied to the proposed rise in fuel duty will finally raise the cost of fuel to a level where many people will consciously alter their transportation choices.  The current unease regarding the cost of fuel should be viewed as an opportunity to promote the aganda of energy efficiency and low-carbon technologies in which Britain is well placed to emerge as a world leader.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
